short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Utility extension allowing you to list and see messages without actually mark them as seen.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension has two sections:
- list of unread messages and a counter if they are more then one
- list of already seen messages
